text.p: Featherlite Mfg Inc and Green Tree Financial Corp said Wednesday they formed Featherlite Financial Services Program to provide retail consumer financing and equipment financing to qualified customers of Featherlite and its dealers.
It also will provide inventory financing to qualified Featherlite dealers.
Green Tree will administer the program, which will cover all products manufactured by Featherlite, including Vantare luxury motorcoaches.

These financing services previously were provided by Featherlite Credit Corp, which is not owned by Featherlite Mfg. Featherlite Credit has signed a letter of intent to sell its portfolio of installment finance and lease contracts to Green Tree.
Featherlite designs, manufactures and markets specialty trailers, including horse, livestock, utility and cargo, drop frame vans and motorcoaches.
Green Tree Financial is a diversified financial services company.
